channel.title: MS Studios Acquires Rights To Gears of War Franchise
channel.description:
Microsoft Studios acquires rights to Gears of War franchise.
[url='https://news.xbox.com/2014/01/games-microsoft-studios-gears-of-war']https://news.xbox.com/2014/01/games-microsoft-studios-gears-of-war[/url]

item.title: MS Studios Acquires Rights To Gears of War Franchise
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
About bloody time. Maybe Epic will finally give the Unreal series some attention.

Read full topic
item.source: MS Studios Acquires Rights To Gears of War Franchise

item.title: MS Studios Acquires Rights To Gears of War Franchise
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Black Tusk Studios is tasked with developing them tho.

Epic has now nothing to do with the series besides providing the engine.

Read full topic
item.source: MS Studios Acquires Rights To Gears of War Franchise
